Text12:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Surely the Master Sword is awaiting you,
just as you are seeking it.
Text21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>You. <sp:5:1:0>You appear to be faced with trouble
once more.

But I see you have procured the
Master Sword.
Text06:
<snd:Sad_00>But...the sword...


It would seem that you no longer wield it.
Where has it gone?
Text07:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>What is this, then?<sp:5:1:0> You do not know
where the Master Sword is?
Text17:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkDeny_01>Hmm?<sp:0:4:0>Ah. So it is you...


<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I must apologize. I am still quite groggy,
as though I am awakening from a
bad dream.
You rid me of that unpleasantness deep
within me.

Yes. You went to great trouble to
restore me.

Thank you.
Text08: <sp:3:0:2:0000>I see. Yet...I can sense it, even now.
Text10:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>In the sky... I feel the Master Sword's
presence strongly in this area.
Text18:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>It has been some time since last
we spoke.

Have you been well?<sp:0:4:0>Hmm, yes, the last time we spoke...<sp:0:4:0>That was when you came here with the
princess to retrieve the Master Sword.
Text20: <sp:3:0:2:0500>The Master Sword seems to be moving.
Text11:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>You may need to be resourceful to reach
the sword, but you must find a way.
